ambition.question: Did I let my desire for power and control, stemming from ambition, influence how I treat others in my pursuit of goals or recognition?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

extracted_data_phrases: of mistreating , harassing , or discriminating against others through my actions
oppression.question: Did I commit the sin of mistreating, harassing, or discriminating against others through my actions?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

extracted_data_phrases: in behaviors that unjustly harassed , discriminated against
oppression.question: Did I engage in behaviors that unjustly harassed, discriminated against, or mistreated others through my actions or deeds?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

extracted_data_phrases: rather than seeing them as complex individuals deserving of love and respect
as complex individuals deserving of love and respect
lust.question: Did I reduce others to their usefulness, or what they could do for me, rather than seeing them as complex individuals deserving of love and respect?
lust.description: While not sexual in nature, this sin is still a form of lust in that it objectifies others who are created in God's image and possesses inherent dignity,

extracted_data_phrases: solely in terms of their usefulness to me
rather than recognizing their inherent worth and dignity
lust.question: Did I see others solely in terms of their usefulness to me, rather than recognizing their inherent worth and dignity?
lust.description: While not sexual in nature, this sin is still a form of lust in that it objectifies others who are created in God's image and possesses inherent dignity,

in terms of convenience , entertainment , or personal gain
of convenience , entertainment , or personal gain
rather than seeing them as fellow human beings created in God 's image
as fellow human beings created in God 's image
lust.question: Did I look at others primarily for what they could provide me in terms of convenience, entertainment, or personal gain, rather than seeing them as fellow human beings created in God's image?
lust.description: While not sexual in nature, this sin is still a form of lust in that it objectifies others who are created in God's image and possesses inherent dignity,

autonomy.question: Did I take for granted my successes in life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

extracted_data_phrases: in my career and personal life
autonomy.question: Did I take for granted the success and accomplishments in my career and personal life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

autonomy.question: Did I take for granted my accomplishments, forgetting to acknowledge the role that God's providence played in my success?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

envy.question: Have I felt envy towards others' accomplishments and secretly wished they would lose their success?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

extracted_data_phrases: particularly in situations where I was under stress or pressure from social expectations
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others using words that were vulgar or inappropriate, particularly in situations where I was under stress or pressure from social expectations?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control when using language that was vulgar or inappropriate, causing offense to others?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: with language that was unbecoming or hurtful
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control in my words, speaking to others with language that was unbecoming or hurtful?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, especially when it came to treats or drinks during family gatherings or celebrations?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: as an end rather than a means to achieve virtue
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking, treating your body as an end rather than a means to achieve virtue?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: over my financial obligations or family needs
prodigality.question: Have I been excessively and wastefully spending money on leisure activities to take precedence over my financial obligations or family needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in speaking ill of others through casual conversations
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in speaking ill of others through casual conversations, even if what was shared seemed harmless at the time?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing others ' private affairs through conversations , messages , or social media posts
through conversations , messages , or social media posts
gossip.question: Have I indulged in sharing others' private affairs through conversations, messages, or social media posts, even if what was shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: on a Sunday , when it could have been avoided
impiety.question: Did I engage in unnecessary work on a Sunday, when it could have been avoided?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

impiety.question: Did you engage in work on a Sunday, a day set aside for rest and worship, when it could have been avoided?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

extracted_data_phrases: on a Sunday when it otherwise could have been avoided , thereby diminishing your respect for the Lord 's Day of rest and worship
for the Lord 's Day of rest and worship
impiety.question: Did you engage in work on a Sunday when it otherwise could have been avoided, thereby diminishing your respect for the Lord's Day of rest and worship?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

extracted_data_phrases: without considering its unitive and procreative purposes in marriage
impurity.question: Did I use certain practices to prevent pregnancy without considering its unitive and procreative purposes in marriage?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.

extracted_data_phrases: in ways that intentionally separate the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage
impurity.question: Did you use practices, substances, or objects to prevent pregnancy in ways that intentionally separate the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.
